data: Ariel, quiet but alert, lay in her steamer chair, one of the most inconspicuous of the several hundred passengers the Bermuda was bringing to New York.
Ariel, quiet but alert, lay in her steamer chair, one of the most inconspicuous of the several hundred passengers the _Bermuda_ was bringing to New York.
